en.title: Usage Guide
en.description: This JSON file is optional and used for manual article management.
en.autoDiscovery: If this file doesn't exist, the system will automatically search for up to 50 article files.
en.addNewArticle: To add a new article: Create an article-N.html file and add it to the articles list.
en.disableArticle: To disable an article: Set the active value to false.
en.reorder: The order of articles in the list doesn't determine the display order. Articles are sorted by ID.
